content.detailedDescription: How many of us have seen a thunderbird (no, not the car, the almost mythical bird)? two days ago, i was sitting with my husband in the 3 p.M. sunshine at our home at big lake, alaska, when i saw a huge bird circling. it was very high up, and the wing span was enormous. i thought perhaps 12 feet. my husband, greg, said, "no. it's an eagle." however, i've seen many eagles in valdez and in haines and some in the matsu valley, and this was bigger than any of them. the bird flew higher and was still quite a ways beneath the high clouds. my husband and looked at each other for about two seconds. we looked back up and the bird was gone, but so was the cloud, which had been fairly large. the bird did not disappear into the cloud: both the bird and the cloud disappeared in the time it took for the two of us to look at each other briefly. in another two minutes, a small airplane flew by, much lower, and i thought that bird was as big as a small plane. i posted this on facebook last night, and a number of people reported they had seen the same thing at various times. you don't give the choice of brown in prominent colors, so i chose black.
content.summary: Bird as large as a small airplane circled as we watched. there was a cloud above it, then both the cloud and the bird disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the harvest moon on 9-16-2016, when an image started to appear around the moon. it was really bright and started moving. i started snapping pictures and saw many images of fast lights and moving objects that i could not explain. i do not know what was captured in the photos, but i do feel they are unexplained and may be useful for research.
content.summary: An unknown light in the sky emerged moved and seemed to release another light.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of work, around 8:30pm. i was just glancing towards the sky, it was dark, and i was amazed at what i saw next. it was this weird ball of dull green light in the sky, it just suddenly appeared, then desended for about three seconds, then disappeared. it was so weird and at first i thought it was a shooting star at first. but then i realized it wasn't.
content.summary: Like a glowing star in space suddenly appeared, desended and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: They both followed the contour of the motorway for about 1/2 a mile before the smaller craft left at high speed just leaving the cigar shaped vesicle slowly tracking along side the motorway, it was slow enough that we left it behind
content.summary: Cigar shaped with smaller round craft at front

content.detailedDescription: Our friend david saw the craft first and brought it to our attention. all four of us were sitting on our front porch when it appeared. the craft hovered for a minute or two then it moved around a bit stopping and hovering at random. we saw red, white, and blue lights while the craft was both moving and hovering. the lights flashed sequentially in the order of red, blue, and white. it continued to move and hover for a few minutes the lights continued to flash the entire time. the craft hovered for a bit before it flew off and we could no longer see it. a few minutes later our roommate katelyn saw an object creating a white strip in the sky. as it passed over the moon the object appeared black. the object appeared to be moving east/northeast from high atmosphere to lower altitude out of sight heading toward the beach/lake in the same place other objects have disappeared to.
content.summary: Hovered for a bit then moved then hovered then moved again

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were coming back from california to our home in pahrump nevada. it was about 3:00 am. i like to drive late at night cause there is no traffic. we came out of the desert on rt 127 and turned onto rt 372 which goes through some small mountains, my wife said to me "look at that". i turned and looked out the passenger window and slowed the car down to a stop and observed a turquoise green glowing orb about 200 feet up plummeting to the ground. we both thought it was going to hit the ground. it was in front of the mountains, about 200 feet from the car and over level ground. all of a sudden, it stopped dead about 15 feet off the ground. hovered there for about 10 seconds, then sped off up and over the mountain never to be seen again. we both had an excellent view of the object and turned to each other and said "wow what was that". we hurried to get past the mountain to see if we could get another glimpse of it, but it was gone.
on a previous occasion i was coming the same way but i was by myself. in almost the same area, only on the 127 before getting to the 372 still in the desert, i observed three orbs of different color. one red, one green, and one yellow. they came streaking past my car at ground level like they were chasing each other. they crossed the road in front of my car and sped down the shoulder on the passenger side about 5 feet off the ground.
content.summary: Green orb came screeming down out of the sky and stopped about 15 feet off the ground then took off

content.detailedDescription: I was outside one day and i was staring at the orion and draco star constellations and a red orb appeared twice. after that day i've been seeing multiple white orb ufos fly around those constellations.
content.summary: Dissappeared in a wormhole

content.detailedDescription: I went to the park w5th my brother and sister we where playing basketball and we heard a hum we all looked up and saw adisk like object kind of hovering in the sky it just kept hovering across the sky for 5 minutes and then slowly fell to the ground we got scared and went to my ghrandmother when we got home we saw it again just this time it zoomed off without a trace
content.summary: I was at the park with my brothers and sister and we saw a thing kind of hovering in the sky it was silver like and had lights

content.detailedDescription:
Gold canyon,az
at 5:30 am i was taking garbage container to street curb looked to east sun light in view but not the  sun itself. it looked like a round shape red/yellow color with a red contrail coming of both sides to quite a distance there was no vapor trail left as it was moving it was spotted around 40 deg from the east horizon and was viewed as i looked straight up and moving in a westerly direction. it took about 20 min from first seeing until it passed overhead.  i felt it was not any bird,plane, or a flying devise that you would normally see in the sky.
content.summary: I thought it was a astroid watched from 40 deg  to overhead view

content.detailedDescription:
First spotted object hovering above our house around 4 pm. my brother and mother were visiting so i asked my brother if he could tell what it was i got my phone and took 2 pictures.
object was white cylinder shaped hovering.
next it would flash red and reflect a metal color. it would return to a white cylinder shaped object and repeat.
after a few minutes it started moving s.E. my mother was sitting on front porch and after object moved far enough south it was viewed by her we all watched it move s.E. until no longer viewable
content.summary: Object hovering above our house then moved to the s.E.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a ufo tonight .Around 8-8:30 september 16th 2016...The ship was going down the red river up here in manitoba canada heading north ... i was going on a tour of the lower fort garry museum  ....It had two deep yellow lights on both sides of the ship that look like long slightly curved  jelly beans that flashed ...With white rotating light circling on the bottom  it was clocked in the clouds.. but its lights gave it away ....As it was flying in the clouds just above or in the tree line which was not much  going about 80 miles an hour it might have been slower but i only saw it for seconds ..I tried to scream to some people to look ..They were working in a shelter about 150 feet away from me and i think the angle was not right for them to see ...They missed it ...But at first i thought it was geese lol like on fire or some sort of plane through the trees that were along the river ridge  ..What else could it be  ...Until i saw it through the opening/clearing of the trees  ...I think that is the closest i have ever seen one of those ships ....They sure are trying to make themselves more know lately with all the reports ...I think they are going to make us aware of their persents   to us soon
content.summary: I was at the lower fort garry waiting to go on a tour up in manitoba close to selkirk

content.detailedDescription: Kirkcaldy,fife between 1am/2am went outside (without phone or camera)to look at the moon which was unusually bright i am looking up and i see 2 objects about 5" apart from my perspective which are star-like in appearance but are moving apart but the same trajectory towards the moon they are almost directly above me but slightly down  (around 80/85/) they are zigzagging at 90/ every second but keeping the same trajectory from my perspective zigzagging by 1/2mm.I watched them for a few minutes then i went indoors.I have seen sattelites and these were not them.They were very bright very far away which would mean they were extremely large for me to see them.In don't know if the moon were illuminating them or they were that far out it was the sun. cheerz
content.summary: Star-like zigzagging objects 2 of.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my name is eric i am from france leaving in south east asia for the past 15 years. i write this post to share with you one of my three ufo experiences. . i am a cgi guy so i make for you a little simulation of the sighting but read my post for a better insight of the story. when i was young in the 70' my dad tell me about all the sighting he was reading in the newspaper and he always tell me there is life up there. as i grow and look at the sky i never saw any thing that look close to a ufo. in my head i was thinking witnessing ufo is like winning a lottery. so inside of me i always thinking sure it must have some other species up there but nothing more. young i have read a few books about it and that all. in 1996, i have 30 years old and was leaving in paris france. one day me and a freind take my car for a drive to his place about 30 kilometer outside paris. in the town of corbeil essonne we drove on the road national 7 at about 5;30 6:00 pm. as we arrive at the entrance of corbeil essonne town we were stuck in a heavy trafic as it is time for everyone to go home after work. my freind was a ufo enthusiast, he like to speak about it read books and always try to get infos. we arrive to a red light at the entrance of corbeil town and get stuck there with many other cars all around us. the sky was grey and the clouds very low. we were listening some music and waiting for the green light. suddenly right in front of us a light dim in and stay still. my freind ask me what it is? my first impression was it is the front light of a plane because i can see some ray going forward the light in the cloud like a powerfull plane front light. but after saying it i say it is not a plane it is way too low to be a plane and the airport is 20 km behind us. also it is not moving. in my head i was thinking of may be a big zeppelin like the dunlop one with on his side a big light at least 3 meter diameters. after a little one light dim in on left side of the first one, it became the same size then the first one and on the right another light dim in too and same as the other became the same size. at this moment i was feeling some kind of fear because in front of me was something i cannot understand and also it feel so big that the unknow and the size make me a strange feeling of amazement and fear at the same time. but something that i cannot explain at that time was also happening deep inside my body, a strange inside feeling that today i know exactely what it was we all get read by this thing from inside. it is a strange feeling to feel something scanning your inside and it add to the fear. my freind next to me, the ufo enthusiast was silent and he was feeling the same thing, but we get aware about the feeling of each other few days later after speaking about it. after the three light stood still for 10 or 12 seconds, the two light on both side dim out and disappear. than the middle light start to become bigger and and brighter, so bright that to our naked eyes we see a black halo around it and all the car and houses around us become very bright. this black and bright white last less than a second. and the light became very small and start moving at an incredible speed without acceleration and it move horizontaly for a little then take an abrupt turn of about 30 to 45 degree and disappear in the clouds. me and my freind were very surprise but all the way to his home no one was speaking about it. i was existed about it but i still have this bad feeling deep inside. i bring him back and after be back to my home, i was thinking why he doesn't talk about it as he was a ufo enthusiast. two days after we meet again and we see in the newspaper "le parisien essonne edition" a witness call from the gendarmerie (a kind of police but military) they want people to come to their office and to testify the sighting. my freind tell me dont go, he was saying it not get us information but maybe trouble and anyway today i know they keep it all secret and will tell you it was venus or blabla... we were a few thousand people stuck in trafic to see this thing so i beleive some have report it. this was my first sighting and it has leave on me a bad feeling at that time and i still remember it like it was yesterday.
content.summary: Three balls of light big and low in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
me and the guys from work go way into the wilderness areas of the adirondack park once a year and explore another spot. photograph a new pond or large tree, stay for a couple of days.  these spots can be extremely hard to walk into.  you use land features to help you get to your location and there is blowdown in places.  we were at pigeon lake in the pigeon lake wilderness on the north side of the lake. it was about 11:30 pm on a friday night. it was warm, so i slept without setting up my tent.  i was looking up at the stars.  you can see a lot, because you are many miles from roads and towns.  the area is old-growth and not all that traveled. we were the only people in there.  some of the sky is obscured by spruce trees.  i should point out that, although this is my third sighting in my 62 years, this is the first time ever seeing one on a camping trip.  i often look up at the stars and never see anything- ever.  all of a sudden, i see an object, maybe 400 or 500 feet in the air to the right of me, flying, silently along the northwest shore of pigeon lake.  i cannot make out it's shaped because of the trees.  no one in our group saw this except me. i shouted out to them to wake up, unsuccessfully.  i cannot estimate it's speed, but after about 7 or 8 seconds it was gone out of sight.  this stunned me. i thought to myself, why is it flying right where we are and no one is within 10 miles of us?  i just could not shake the idea that it knew we were there, and not just coincidental, although it could be.  i have no idea why it was red lit.  maybe, so it could be seen, and what is the purpose of that particular color?  
  i have one other reported sighting in here that occurred in 1996. a second
one, about 4 years ago that i think i did not report, that i cannot figure out how to classify it.  it was a stationary object that did not appear to be a ufo, but looked surreal.  it freaked my wife and me out and we had to pull off the road in the middle of the day.
content.summary: Red lit flat object, trees did not let me get it's shape down.  very bizarre.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see it . friend texted several pictures while visiting kids a college 

stationary circle of lights   . they joked if we get abducted ...  then texted back and  sent several pictures .   not sure what it is but pretty weird
content.summary: A large circle  /. ring of lights

content.detailedDescription: It was hovering in the west. it had an orange surface with square windows, a yellow light was glowing on the inside. it rose up about a thousand feet in about 2 seconds then ascended eastward.
content.summary: It was orange surface with several rolls of windows with a yellow light being lit from within, egg-shaped about 7 stories tall from top to bottom.

content.detailedDescription: I have wanted to talk to you all for several years. i observed an event as a senior in high school and my friends and i thought that we had better keep it under our hats. but i know that i have seen so much more over the years; i just want to know. last night i watched a light for 15-30 min in the eastern sky.  the light seemed to get closer then move away, move up and down - i watched it for a good while and then it just went zip away through the clouds in the sky. so if you wnt more specific please call me im better at talking then typing [please let me know?]
content.summary: Observed flashing lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing by a window in a bathroom when i noticed the light. it wasn't point-like, but too small in apparent size to see any detail in shape.It's color was similar to mars. due to local rooftops i didn't see it long. it covered about 10 degrees of sky in a minute. it was about as bright as jupiter or the iss ever gets. it was under the clouds and heading roughly west, which rules out the iss. its glow was steady, and when i went outside to see if there were any more i noticed the air was still, so this rules out a chinese lantern. i'm an astrophysicist who also gives public astronomy lectures so i know the sky.
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription:
A feeding process in which they thought i was capable of being harvested. i microwaved a grudge looking creature in my closet covered in blood from other torture victims most likely. i was being paralyzed back in forth, but my implants allow me to still move somewhat and i'm good with warfare which doesn't include any moving around or much thinking.
they, these almost physiological anime-like characters destroyed/ate a portion of me, but failed to survive afterwards. i continued my assault and the enemy turned their own fallen into a tool to destroy me, but i consumed the tool. my system has been designed to be a melting pot. i would love to offer personal info and urls, but can't... please contact me. 

i recovered some of my lost & destroyed energy through boot leg time travel energy duplication methods. i didn't actually do the time travel, but fueled it by sharing with my allies who came hours later.

from 600 feet, it was the size of a basket ball in the sky. it was a feast for everybody who was a victor in this event. 

it was outside of course, but i was inside watching it all, and it pissed them off because they couldn't do the same exact thing. my radar is an actual device and it was used to pick up on any thing which enters my territory only.., not some type of spiritual reading from my actual body hardware in conjunction with zen mind state.

a lot of the details prior to this summary in the previous questionaire section probably seem lame because most of those options are the most probable signs, but this was actually pretty bizarre.

i didn't detect any other witness, but there had to be some, because people died so i can use my allies to gather their perspectives because they at one time had perspectives so it's simply something to be read up on.
content.summary: They turned their fallen comrade into an artifact. battle involving soul harvesting.

content.detailedDescription: At about 4:45 this morning,sept 12th,  i went outside for a cigarette, when i looked to see if it was cloudy, but saw stars, but then i noticed an orange one moving rather rapidly, id did not have aircraft lights, as i watched it head north, then it did a rapid zigzag from left to right rather quickly at least 4 times, then it disappeared over the horizon.I am ex air force, and don't know of any aircraft that can manouver that quickly. i am the east coast of australia, near ballina in nsw.
content.summary: Saw an orange light, heading north, then to my astonishment, it did a very quick zig-zag pattern at least 4 times , then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: We walked out of a store and looked up and commented how low the full moon was. out of the right corner of my eye i see really bright lights. there was a star to their bottom left which seemed completely dull compared to them. i at first thought it was a plane but then realized they were coming closer together while ascending straight up, completely vertical. they got so close that it almost looked like it was one light (because the lights were so bright  and they were enough away from each other that i could see that they were definitely in a triangle shape). it hovered for a few seconds then literally disappeared before our eyes. no dimming, no flash...Just gone.
content.summary: Lights in sky joined then ascended, hovered and vanished

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 7:15pm, me and my four children witnessed three unidentified silver objects in the sky. first we heard low flying jets, naturally my children wanted to see them. we stepped outdoors, and immediately saw a silver object hovering in the sky for a few seconds and then disappear. soon after, two more silver objects appeared out of no where and made triangle. after a brief moment all three disappeared, then reappeared in a different part of the sky. all the while three jets scrambled to keep up with them. it looked almost like a cat and mouse game, with these objects appearing and disappearing, the whole thing lasted about 10 mins, and we also noticed that the clouds and sun set were the strangest color and unusual.  sadly one of my kids broke the screen of my cell phone a few days ago, so i wasn't able to video this event! :( hopefully someone else in the arklatex witnessed this and reported this.
content.summary: Heard jets flying fast and low. stepped outside saw one silver round object, it cloaked itself then moved to another part of the sky. then two more silver objects appeared out of nowhere to form a triangle. as objects cloaked 3 jets tried to catch them.

content.detailedDescription: At dusk, myself and my roomate had just walked out of our woods after a short small game hunting trip. our other roomate was standing in the driveway facing west just staring at something in the sky. we said "hey whats up?"..He just pointed at this classic black triangle tr-3b style craft without losing his focus on it. so at that moment i pulled my phone out to capture it on film or at least get a picture, but the craft wouldnt show up on my screen in the shot. almost like it was cloaked, but we could still see it with the naked eye. it was moving less than 100mph easily, it seemed as if it would just fall from the sky it was moving so slow. the altitude it was at is unknown because i dont know how large it was, but it seemed to be only a few hundred feet in the air and very big. it was so close i felt like i could reach out and touch it. it was loud like a airliner as it was coming at us, but was silent when it was above us, and had a quiet hum that almost made you want to vomit as it flew away to the east. none of us had any fear, we all swemed pretty calm, if not "amazed". it had small squared windows on the side, three red lights on the corners of the undercarriage, a big white light in the center of the undercarriage, and a vertically vented rear "thruster" area. there is always ufo activity out there, some at space altitudes, and some closer. but this was the only one weve ever been able to clearly make out what it was. surely other farmers and local saw the craft.
content.summary: Black triangle craft flew over our home very slowly at dusk. myself and 2 others witnessed the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm trying to get information about a possible invasion in the panhandle area. there is constant communication directly towards me and i need to see if anyone within the mufon organization can pickup on their conversations. 

i am located in pensacola and want members to hear what is being transmitted everyday towards me. these "people" are monitoring my brain activity, they say dream sequence monitoring, and monitor my body movements. supposedly they are communicating through a security company. it's like they are communicating through the air. no one around me can hear it...They also have the capability of broadcasting my environment to others around them.

there is always a buzzing noise and they won't stop communicating to me. i always hear little plunger like noises. this person keeps talking about doing a brain experiment. they complain about not being able to view me.
content.summary: Communication in pensacola

content.detailedDescription: I have reached out to you before. i have had four+ dr ask me when did i have tubes put in my ears......I never have!!!!!!! in the last three years i have been dealing with unexplained skin rashes, weird sore patterns in weird spots,loss of time at night!! now my lawn by my bedroom window has three darkened burn circles, two about 12ft apart from each other, next one is about 16 ft apart from the other two... shaped like a triangle!! middle grass is pressed down.  i walk this way everyday to get the mail. this happened last night or the night before!!  help!!!! i need answers please!!!
content.summary: Three circle burns in triangular shape with flattened grass in middle. four different doctors for unexplained illnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
~
about 2:45 am in denver @ n 39°43.239' w -105°01.853' on the backdoor above ground near the steps way on ground level i was sitting in my green camping chair facing north into the twin trees, i was shining my green laser pen into the north west sky area next to the twin trees & kinda of meditating & thinking about my starfamily after a walk i went on @ 12:35am to barnum park area, as i was sitting there & looking up into the sky i saw an object appear to the north east of me in my farsight & win i looked @ it was just sitting there above the twin trees, a kinda of an oval shape craft in moon light sliver/gray in color & i said cool! 


then it glowed a white light all over its body & a beam of white light in a ½ moon shape in front of its self-facing southbound for a few seconds or was it mins or hours ? ( i have no concept of time ) i never have, i said awesome in my mind, then the glow went out with the object steal sitting there & i said thank you to them or it, then it blink to disappears it didn’t move it just cloaked, it seem like 5 or 6 mins or don’t really know how long it was for me more of hours or days unknown, i really have no concept of time, that has always been a problem for me, anyway they said in my mind to share this experience with earth people, it’s time for the public to know about them .


^

the craft was about 7 telephone poles high & about 400 ft across,
just a bit lower then what airplanes fly at.


&


i've been remembering things from 25 jul ifo experience
but don't know how to say it in english, it was a big 
heavy download, also been figuring out the details on the 
experience but been unable to draw the craft for unknown 
reasons but made a small model of it to show what i saw at 
night in moonlight, i really don't want to share it because 
it's not the first but they ask me too so you earth people 
can try to understand this stuff is real, but this really 
has been happening all my life but it changed in 95, i guess 
they knew i needed a break, what's different now is i reawaken 
my spirit to a higher state of awareness & me asking them i 
of need them back like it was in my teens, this time in stead 
of flying off they sticking around to say hello, i know that 
99% of you well never believe this but i've learned it's not 
that important to people who don't open their heart's & 
soul's to understanding they are a part of our universe & i 
know 100% i'm a part of them as they are me. 
~
content.summary: My 25 jul ufo experience in the moonlight @ 2:45am

content.detailedDescription:
ufo experience 
it was the year of 2012 i was 11 or 12 at the time of the incident it had taken place at a foster home in stoney creek hamilton ontario canada. it was late really late id say around 12am-3am i was sharing a room with my brother at the time and we were both sound asleep until i woke up and walked over to my window that had a plastic pull down curtin and beaming through it was a strange white light so bright that i could see my room as if the light was on i wanted to pull up the curtin but i was frozen as if some thing was holding me hostage i was not scared tho it felt so natural to me and i don’t know why i don’t even know why i woke up that night. i am 16 now and i still wonder what the strange whit light was to this day but ever since the incident i have been obsessed with ufos and aliens and discovering the truth
content.summary: I was younger and it was late i did not see it but i know it was a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
The time is around 9:30 and i find myself sitting in my car listening to music while smoking. my car was parked outside my house, in front of my garage door. when all of a sudden, i look to my left out my window and i notice a fairly large ball of light. instinctively i think, airplane or satellite. however the object then appeared to hover up and down ever so slightly. it appeared to be hovering down slightly. the object was low enough that you could distinctly see window panels and lights in between. the object looked disc shaped, and was not in the clouds, but in between the clouds and tree line. the object kept on hovering for about 3/5 minutes before leaving. when it descended, it actually vanished, followed by a hazy white line in the sky that disappeared within 3 minutes. the line in the sky didn't take as long as 'chemical trails' take to disappear. it literally vanished within minutes. following the ufo siting, about less than 5 minutes later a plane that looked very similar to a b-2 spirit x-plane appeared to show up to the scene, and left promptly. 
when i saw the object, after i saw it hovering and spinning, i knew this was not a human aircraft. my stomach churned and my heart dropped when i realized what i was seeing.
content.summary: The ufo was hovering in the woods.  you could see light panels and lights pulsating. the ufo was also spinning while hovering. it then disappeared but left a white trail that disappear within 3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the trash and happened to look up in front of me and saw 2 orange lights hovering. one above the other. i knew this was not any kind of aircraft and was a ufo. i knew because the lights began to move very quickly up and down and side to side, then did figure eights. the top one did this first and then the top one faded out then the bottom one did the same kind of movements then also faded out. i was shocked but very interested. i was actually very thrilled i finally got to see a ufo. also the air force base we live close to was very bright and seemed to have a very "smokey" cloud right above and their lights where very bright. the air base has never been like this before.
content.summary: Bright orange lights moved sparatic in figure eights and moved up and down then side to side

content.detailedDescription: I was at pathfinder park with my wife and daughter, as we were leaving i wanted to take a photo of the landscape/view from the park.  i framed my shot and saw nothing in the sky, took the photo and saw a black spot on the photo preview within a couple seconds.  i immediately returned my attention to the sky to try to see what it was i captured.  i also had both my wife and daughter scanning the sky for anything and none of us could find anything.  i never saw anything with my own eyes, but my iphone camera captured something.  i also checked the lens to see if there was anything on it and it was clear.  i also had my attention focused to this point in the sky and i should have seen birds or bugs flying around.
content.summary: Caught unidentified object in phone camera photo.
